thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb Hotel -
thread.title_full: Superb Hotel - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: shadylady2509
title: Superb Hotel -
text:
We stayed here for 4 days in march for our anniversary and I have to say what a fantastic time we had.
The hotel is of a very high standard. It is superbly clean from top to bottom. The mini bar is stocked daily which is free of charge. The breakfast is excellent and entertained every morning with different delights inc homemade cakes and bread.
It is well located being 10 mins walk to the fountains. The tour bus is just up the road which you can hop on and off.
I would say this hotel is more of a 5* than a 4. We only booked it after reading the comments on here and it certainly lived up to its reviews
Thank you for making our break so special
